title: (29680) Estepona - nº168 Avenida Andalucía
description: Laundry - Waschsalon - no parking

title: (29680) Estepona -
description: Ideal place to park, next to the ALDI, Lidl and Mercadona. I do not know if it could stay overnight although I do not see any sign that prohibits it

title: (29680) Estepona - 142 Calle Juan Benitez
description: Slightly inclined public parking, water tap across the road.

title: (29680) Estepona - Avenida Andalucía
description: Very clean laundry with three washing machines (2 × 12 kg, 1x 16 kg) and two tumble dryers as well as a cash machine. On the other side of the street are cafes to wait. Parking is not easy because it is a residential area. Especially difficult for large motorhomes.

title: (29680) Estepona - 146 Urbanizacion Colegios II
description: Street parking with large spots (6m) suitable for vans. No services but a small water fountain is close by.

title: (29680) Estepona - 141 Calle Juan Benitez
description: Fountain

title: (29680) Estepona - 136 Avenida Juan Carlos I
description: Drinking Water tap with good pressure and you can also empty your grey water. Big rubbish bin opposite. Also: Aldi,Lidl and BP very close by. Plenty of parking spaces in the immediately surroundings . Quite safe area(lighten at night).

title: (29680) Estepona - 682 Calle Monterroso
description: Gas station with a full convenience store and mini cafe where food can be purchased. You can purchase propane tank, use car wash and vacuum services, as well as electric charging stations. Also a place where you can fill up your water tank

title: (29680) Estepona - 15 Avenida Puerta del Mar
description: Online parking, wide, flat, quiet and little traffic. It is a little removed from the beach, there is usually free space.

title: (29680) Estepona - 83 Avenida Puerta del Mar
description: Free parking next to the bullring near the port and 20 minutes from the historic center of Estepona. Small places ideal for camper Max 5.40

title: (29680) Estepona - 8 Calle Polonia
description: Online parking near the Port. With a large playground and restaurant / bar next door

title: (29680) Estepona - 110 Calle Matías Prats
description: Perfect place to visit the city ... overnight stays are not allowed but the squares are large

title: (29680) Estepona - 36 Calle Edison
description: Deposit repsol. possibility to buy a bottle of gas repsol (orange), without having had before, and the adapter that goes on a French lyre. without a contract. all for 35.50 euros (gas bottle adapter, about 12 euros each) warm welcome

title: (29680) Estepona -
description: Aparcamiento para pasar la noche Justo frente al mar. Muchas furgonetas alrededor acompañando. Sitio tranquilo y agradable, la policía pasó y no nos dijo nada a ninguna furgoneta.

title: (29680) Estepona - 12 Avenida Litoral
description: Commercial parking area 2.5 km from the center of Estepona. A 30 minute walk. Nearby there are cafes, the bus station and the Carrefour.

title: (29693) Estepona - 453 Calle las Camelias
description: Parking space along side one way street, with next to it a playground. at end of the street there is a garbage container. Low traffic road and a quiet night.

title: (29680) Estepona - 146 Camino de Montesol
description: An official supply and disposal with floor drain and extra inlet for cassettes. On the grounds of a nursery. Possible for vehicles up to 9 meters. After paying, the tap is opened.

title: (29680) Estepona - Unnamed Road
description: Very nice view of the heights of Estepona and the sea 4x4 path with a big climb quiet place but barking dog.

title: (29680) Estepona - s/n Calle Flaminio
description: Public parking spaces within a residential area. There are many parked campers .

title: (29693) Estepona - 2A Urbanizacion Sup
description: Parking is on a side street and very quiet at night. It is 600 m to ALDI, 250 m to MERCADONA. There is a beach nearby, 1500 m, and even a nudist beach. As, unfortunately very often, the naturists get the bad parts of the beach. The parking strips even offer space for longer WoMos. (7.5 m) Please always remember, we are guests in Spain - so NO camping, NO garbage disposal and NO emptying cassettes - Thank you, because I want to be able to come to Spain more often.

title: (29693) Estepona - 3P Urbanizacion SUP06 Arroyo Vaquero Play
title_short: (29693) Estepona - 3P Urbanizacion SUP06 Arroyo Vaquero Play
description: Very quiet area with battery parking and very close to the Costa Natura beach.

title: (29689) Estepona - 202A Diseminado la Alberdina
description: Rest area after Repsol gas station towards Malaga. With free water tap and another one for payment. If you ask for permission they let you drink for free, otherwise there is another paid tap next to it.

title: (29680) Estepona - Unnamed Road
description: Pretty steep road, also big holes in the ground, good for off-road cars, or maybe small vans, nothing bigger. You can hear the highway

title: (29680) Estepona - MA-8301
description: Access track to the power lines on the road that goes up to the Salvador Guerrero Place watchtower for a 4x4 or a van on the edge of the track, far from the main road. fantastic sunrise. Clean place

title: (29680) Estepona - MA-8301
description: Nice views of the sea and the mountains from the same place.

title: (29680) Estepona -
description: Wonderful place to stay the night. accessible for all vehicles

title: (29680) Estepona - 1 Zona Sup-C13 Torrevigía
description: Private parking of the Selwo Aventura facilities. For a fee you can spend the whole day visiting the zoo theme park.

name: Camping Parque Tropical
title: (29680) Camping Parque Tropical
description: Small, quiet and friendly place. Shady and sunny places. Pool and baby pool/covered in winter. Warm showers and sinks. 2 washing machines and 1 dryer. A few bungalows. Secret path to the beach (300m), through a tunnel under the highway. Beautiful beach. Promenade paved to Estepona. cars can be heard. Strom every 3rd place. Fill water in several places by canister. Or by hose at the entrance, where gray and black water can also be emptied. Toilet cassette at the wash house next to the dish washing places. No smell! Everything clean, hygiene rules are observed. Also feasible for larger mobile. E.g. 9m long, 3.30m high.

title: (29693) Buenas Noches - 7A Calle Tranquila
description: Automatic laundry service station. Well coming back from Morocco especially for the laundry of course. Day parking only

title: (29680) Estepona - 78734 Torrevigía
description: Una calle por debajo de selwoo aventura . se puede pernoctar sin problema y cerca del parque .. sin servicios pero muy tranquilo

title: (29690) Casares del Mar - 82 Lugar Urbanizacion Casares del Mar
title_short: (29690) Casares del Mar - 82 Lugar Urbanizacion Casares del Mar
description: Parking with access to Perros beach!

name: Estación de Servicio Repsol
title: (29680) Estación de Servicio Repsol
description: LPG gas refilling station

title: (29680) Estepona - Unnamed Road
description: Natural site of Sierra bermeja Estepona, catering service and free parking highly recommended.

title: (29690) Bahía de Casares - 9P Lugar Urbanizacion Perla de la Bahia
title_short: (29690) Bahía de Casares - 9P Lugar Urbanizacion Perla de la Bahia
description: Simple parking in a residential area. Facing the sea, access to the beach.

address.street: 9P Lugar Urbanizacion Perla de la Bahia

title: (29680) Estepona - Unnamed Road
description: Start of the trail Paseo de los Pinsapos. Space for two AC or three camper for parking.

title: (29680) Estepona - MA-8301
description: Stabilized parking for 2 bedrooms with superb views of the coast. Low traffic road in winter.

title: (29690) Marina de Casares - 1 Marina Urbanization Casares
title_short: (29690) Marina de Casares - 1 Marina Urbanization Casares
description: This stop provided a quiet area to park overnight where no prohibition signs were present on the 12.02.22.

title: (29680) Estepona - 7 Urbanización Playa Guadalmansa
description: Super place for motorhomes, the shower is located on the beach farther away 40m.

title: (29688) Playa del Sol Villacana - 64 Calle Guadalmansa
title_short: (29688) Playa del Sol Villacana - 64 Calle Guadalmansa
description: Nice quiet place on the beach - sand and pebbles. Your navigation might say it's not possible to get there - it is. Space for Two to four vans directly on the beach and more space a bit in the back. No services, no restaurants. Some Buildings are under construction nearby so maybe not so quiet anymore in the future. There were about five vans/motorhomes here in January.

title: (29680) Estepona - 1 Calle Ganges
description: Nice parking lot by the sea in hardly visited dead end street.

title: (29680) Estepona - MA-8301
description: Wide and flat spot before entering Los Reales. Very large, for the possibility of many vans. Easy to get there. Away from everyone, isolated and quiet.

title: (29690) Marina de Casares - 2 Marina Urbanization Casares
title_short: (29690) Marina de Casares - 2 Marina Urbanization Casares
description: Public parking with playground on the beach, only day parking and for short Campers.

title: (29688) Playa del Sol Villacana - 39 Calle Jorge
title_short: (29688) Playa del Sol Villacana - 39 Calle Jorge
description: Small spot with sea view, you have to go through a small dirt road (it's quite tight, we narrowly passed with a van, transport). Direct access to the sea, short walk on both sides which gives access to showers and toilets (on the left facing the sea).

title: (29492) Jubrique - Unnamed Road
description: Loop of old road, very quiet spot to spend the night.

title: (29688) Playa del Sol Villacana - Calle Adriano
title_short: (29688) Playa del Sol Villacana - Calle Adriano
description: Very quiet location at the end of the street, 20 meters from the beach. Security that runs every 20 minutes. No service. Walking. The night illuminated.

title: (29692) Manilva - 9 Diseminado Camino de Estepona
description: Large paved public car park. Two water points are located near the service premises. 5 minutes by car from the baths. same for the Lidl.

title: (29692) Manilva - 6 Calle la Florida
description: Laundromat at a Repsol service station

title: (29492) Genalguacil -
description: Waterfall in a bend of Sierra Bermeja. You can take water and recharge. It looks crystal clear. Nearby there is a place to rest that you will see on the maps of this application. Take care of this beautiful environment!!

title: (29688) Estepona - 98 Carretera Nacional N-340
description: Large car park next to Lidl and Mecadona.No height or lenght restriction.Free of charge day/night.Next to motorway A7 but quiet at night with few traffic passing.Great for one night and grocery shopping.Close to beach and restaurants.

title: (29692) San Luis de Sabinillas - 4 Calle Virgen de África
title_short: (29692) San Luis de Sabinillas - 4 Calle Virgen de África
description: A quiet place without water service or drains but for a weekend, it's good

title: (29688) Saladillo Benamara - Calle Sotavento
description: Superb parking spaces by the sea, access to the beach showers. Very quiet, super residential area.

title: (29692) San Luis de Sabinillas - 2 Avenida de la Paz
title_short: (29692) San Luis de Sabinillas - 2 Avenida de la Paz
description: Very clean laundromat. Close parking in Avenida de Espana, even for large camper vans. Cash only, but they have a change machine. 8 a.m. - 11 p.m. very friendly and helpful staff.

title: (29692) San Luis de Sabinillas - 2a Avenida de Espana
title_short: (29692) San Luis de Sabinillas - 2a Avenida de Espana
description: Parking allowed by City Hall. You can access the town and the promenade on foot through the footbridge.

title: (29690) Casares - 1T Carretera Estepona
description: Large car park at the exit of the village. Beautiful view of the mountains and the ocean in the distance. On the other hand the small mountain road passes not very far, we hear the light traffic of the latter.

title: (29691) Manilva -
description: Parking/overnight stay just below the bridge at the creek. 500m to the Roman bath. There is another large parking space a few meters further, but it is very crooked and uncomfortable and not suitable for overnight stays.

title: (29690) Casares - C. Guardia Civil
description: We spent the night here without any problem the other car parks were full

title: (29691) Manilva - Cam. los Baños
description: Nice spot to spend few nights in the nature. There are several hiking routes (4-8km long) and a Roman Bath (Baños romanos de la Hedionda.) Easy access to the city.

title: (29690) Manilva - Camino los Baños
description: Great place to park, near Bašos de la Hedionda, busy at weekends but worth it. parking under the bridge with 8m camper is ok. right on the creek. Not really suitable for overnight stays.

title: (29691) Manilva - 2 Arrabal sin Nomre Ma
description: Large green sandy area with space for Womo/Van's Perfect for one night.

title: (29690) Casares - Calle Guardia Civil
description: Parking in front of a school, superb view of the city of Casares. The civil guardia passed in the evening around 22:30.

title: (29690) Casares - 46D Calle Chorrete
description: Small plot of land very close to the village of Casares and next to the school, quiet and small and beautiful city to visit. Mountain village very close to Estepona.

title: (29690) Casares - 26 MA8300
description: Ideal parking for small camper, near the city.

title: (29691) Manilva - 1 Arrabal Cementerio Nuevo
description: Parking on the outskirts of Manilva. The buses park there. We asked the police and they told us that we could stay parked, without taking anything out. We had a good night. It is lit by some spotlights

title: (29690) Casares - A-7150
description: Next to it there is a tourist information office and a lookout point. It is possible to reach the center of Casares with a pedestrian access of 1.2 km just to the left of the Tourist Office. The wastewater disposal is on the left at the tourist center about 50 meters down the street on the right. An inconspicuous shaft with a metal cover.

title: (29688) El Paraíso - 22 Calle de Sabinillas
description: Large parking area with leafy trees that provide good shade. Unpaved gravel floor. During the day there are parked cars of workers from the nearby offices and shops. At night very quiet. A lot of noise from the highway too close. But supermarkets and services nearby and nobody tells you anything.

name: Camping La Bella Vista
title: (29692) Camping La Bella Vista
description: Camping Bella Vista, great comfort, health luxury. Parcel bounded by vegetation. Each location has supplies water, electricity, TV, wifi, and wastewater evacuation. Mini Market and restaurant. Set on the edge of beach and 200 m from the Marina.

title: (29690) Casares - A-377
description: At the foot of the wind turbines. Maginfique view. The opportunity to verify that wind turbines do not make so much noise!

title: (29688) Estepona - 27 Urbanización Nueva Atalaya
description: Good place to spend a night. Without services, bakery, cafeteria, supermarket, very close. There are shady areas, very quiet at night.

title: (29679) Benahavís - Unnamed Road
description: I found this place during my hike. Its near an abandoned building and it is peaceful and quiet here. It had good views and you are close to Benahavis but in nature.

title: (29692) Manilva - 3D Urbanización Manilva Beach
description: Small shadow. In front of the beach. Perfect to spend the day. Solo camper very steep and narrow entrance

title: (29678) Marbella - 304 Calle 9A
description: Very quiet place right on the beach. Next to a golf course. Driveway is a bit greasy, however, because damn narrow. Maximum 2.30 m in width passage. No height limit. But definitely not suitable for mobile homes. This narrow driveway is also in a one-way street. No chance to go back then. It was exhausting, but I just made it with a van / van 6.50 m long and folded mirrors.

title: (29679) Benahavís - A 7175
description: On the by-passed old road A-7175 just in front of the Ermita Virgen del Rosario. Nice flat tarmac area, plenty of space. Walkers and hikers during the day but quiet at night. In very nice countryside.

title: (29690) Casares - A-377
description: Small parking on the roadside, in the countryside in front of the Crestellina massif.

title: (29679) Benahavís - Calle la Rivera
description: Nicely designed parking lot in front of the soccer field with a few larger parking spaces. Good place to spend the night. It's quiet even if there is a road next to it. At the entrance to the dog park there is a tap with drinking water.

title: (29679) Benahavís - 1B Calle Molino
description: Faucet with good pressure and with no screw.

title: (29679) - 1 Arrabal Sg. 1
description: We parked here for the night, super quiet, right by the river. We were the only camping car here, no facilities but this village is super cute, fantastic park for young children (ours were 6 and 3), with a cafe inside it.

title: (29679) Benahavís - Calle Camino del Molino
description:
Near a water plan
some Walker, very quiet
no Swiming
leave this place clean

title: (29492) Genalguacil - 20 MA-8304
description: Quiet place at the entrance of the village next to a park for children

title: (29670) San Pedro de Alcántara -
description:
A large but not massive parking area under the tall trees that should provide plenty of shade in the warmer months. The ground is a mixture of gravel and dirt and it looks like it could support big motorhomes even if it rains. There's plenty of space and good access tarmac/gravelly road.
Facilities;
Wakeboard / waterski Cable Park, (you should be able to use the shower there and get a bit to eat at their restaurant /bar, maybe sunbathe on their lawns, there is also a pool.
Golf club with bar
Walking is perfect for dog owners. And the area is visited by locals walking there dogs.
I also stumbled upon this BMX /  MTB track
I had a very quiet stay from 2 days at the weekend in Mid November it was nice to get away from the extreme windy weather and shelter here.

title: (29492) Genalguacil - 10 Calle la Lomilla
description: Large parking in two terraces. Attention accessible only to vans arranged of maximum 6 meters, possible night, super calm with exceptional panorama. Not very flat, desirable wedges.

title: (29492) Genalguacil - 2 Avenida Estepona
description: Small car park at the entrance to the village. Flat and beautiful view. Except Tuesday market day.

title: (29691) Margen Izquierdo - Carretera A7
description: A Repsol station with a shower. It looks bad but there is hot water. It’s free. Ask for the key in the gas station. The shower is in a small building next to the ticket office.

title: (29670) San Pedro Alcántara -
description: Self-service laundry at gas station, no problem for parking

title: (29692) Manilva - 415D Urbanizacion Playa Paraiso
description: Parking overnight no problem.

title: (29670) Marbella - 1E Urbanización Linda Vista Playa
description: Land parking on the beachfront. It does not have services but it has a beach bar next to it and bins.  Very close to the promenade and less crowded.

title: (29691) Manilva -
description:
On the left bank of the rio, totally flat location, 10 m from the river.
little water but very pleasant. fish galore, frogs at night. a very quiet night, saw no one.
the road to get there is a very rolling gravel road, accessible to all vehicles. To recommend

title: (29670) Marbella - 263 Calle los Eucaliptos
description: Great and safe place just a few steps from the beach and a big promenade.  Showers, water and WC at the beach.

title: (29492) Genalguacil - 2 Diseminado el Cerrillar
description: Parking on the outskirts of town 500 meters. With a motorhome you cannot go through its streets. Better to leave here. The town is worth it.

title: (29691) Manilva -
description: Very nice spot at the riverside with many possibilities to park. The dirt road might be difficult if wet, but it is easy accessible eith a Sprinter sized van for example. beautiful view into the landscape and very calm asswell. quite a lot dirt lying around, though. pick some of it up and take a dive in the river Guadiaro. probably quite nice for fishing, too.

title: (29480) Casares - A-377
description: A corner of paradise on the edge of a nice little refreshing river. Leave the road to enter a small path. Rather for fitted vans. For motorhomes, access seems narrow, but there is also parking at the beginning of the road.

title: (29670) Marbella - 4P Carretera de Ronda
description: Plain sand, is large and is at different heights, at the entrance of San Pedro, round direction. In front there is a King burguer (with wifi and WC) nearby there is a laundry, bars, banks and supermarkets (behind the burguer King)

title: (29670) Marbella - 2 Arrabal PASP11
description: Self-service laundry

title: (29690) Casares - Unnamed Road
description: Quiet spot by the river. We first went to the one on the map a little south along the river, but it was dirty and muddy. This area is bigger, offers more possibilities and has small pebbles as a surface so not as dirty. Sounds of the river and the birds. Very peaceful.

title: (11360) San Roque - 4 Urbanización Invespania
description: Fallow future residential area with great views of Gibraltar .. Access steep .. Absolutely quiet. Beware of wind ... Exposed ...

title: (29670) Marbella - 8V Lugar Urbanizacion Nueva Alcantara
description: Parking for rest near the beach. In summer crowded. Without water services or discharge.

title: (29670) San Pedro Alcántara - 54 Avenida Oriental
description: It is at the entrance of San San Pedro, you can walk everywhere, near banks, shops, supermarkets, bars, etc. It has no service, it is a flat land where it parks. In front there is a park with fountains and litter bins, very close there are also garbage cans

title: (29670) Marbella - 42 Lugar Urbanizacion Nueva Alcantara
description: Perfect for sleeping

title: (11312) San Roque - 67 Urbanización San Diego
description: access for small cars, we have to pass the tunnel through the baixo da nacional. Agree with a marvelous view, with Gibraltar at the bottom.

title: (29670) Marbella - 2E Lugar Urbanizacion Nueva Alcantara
description: Quiet place, according to a couple who comes here regularly, it is the tourist office who told them that we can stay here. The beach is a 5 minute walk away. There are no houses and the places are level. This weekend we were 4 motorhomes.

title: (29492) Jubrique - 14 Diseminado Bollaco
description: Parking located at the top of the village. Quiet area with water, picnic table and good views. Flat area. It is better to go around the town through the area of the hermitage than to cross it (very steep and narrow slope).

title: (29490) - 27 Diseminado Poligono 1
description: Quiet place to have lunch next to the deep stream, you can also cool off in a small pool, leaving the paved path to the right is the footbridge path about 4 or 5 km of very easy path for all audiences.

title: (11360) San Diego -
description: Motorhome parking. Simple place with no services. Muddy when it rains. beautiful view. pretty close to the main road so a bit noisy.

title: (29679) Benahavís - A-397
description: Parking on a relatively busy road. Great view but also street noise.

title: (29660) Marbella - S/N Calle Quevedo
description: Two-way avenue with plenty of parking (we arrived on Saturday afternoon). School area and sports center nearby, about 2 or 3 kilometers from the beach (of stones). Close to several popular places.

title: (29679) Benahavís -
description: There are lots of spots to park all along this road (including others marked on Park4night already). We stayed here as it is a bit set back from the road and less visible. It is a small area to pull into behind some trees - it can be hard to see the entrance so go slowly round the corner. There is space for 2-3 small vans and there is a nice view down to the sea.

title: (29679) Benahavís - Camino al Caserío de las Máquinas
title_short: (29679) Benahavís - Camino al Caserío de las Máquinas
description: Parking departure from hiking. Lets park a little behind the road. Noisy anyway because a lot of traffic in the summer until late at night and early in the morning.

address.street: Camino al Caserío de las Máquinas

title: (11360) San Diego - Av. Mar del Sur
title_short: (11360) San Diego - Av. Mar del Sur
description: Large parking next to the road, in front of the Milla de Plata hotel, and next to the hotel a path to the beach, very uncrowded as it has many rocks, transparent waters

title: (29660) Marbella - 25B Ventura del Mar
description: Parking at the edge of the beach, with shaded areas. The street hardly has any traffic. In front of the promenade that leads to Puerto Banús and San Pedro de Alcántara.

title: (29679) Benahavís - Carretera de Ronda
description: There are quite a few little areas like this along the road.  We stayed here because it was just out of sight of Marbella.  The surrounding hills are covered in there's and we could get a few metres away from the ,not too busy, road.

name: Camping San Juan
title: (29492) Camping San Juan
description: Camping "San Juan" Place to relax and enjoy nature, with lots of native trees, general river at the foot of the campsite ... Very cordial and friendly service. Suggestions: grilled sausage skewer with Quejigo wood ... In male brown bread! For sale San Juan?

name: CAMPING GENAL
title: (29492) CAMPING GENAL
description: Jubrique, MA-8305. GENERAL CAMPING

name: Área de Servicio para Autocaravanas
title: (29490) Área de Servicio para Autocaravanas
description: 5 pitches for motorhomes at the entrance to the village with 5 service terminals and emptying. Parking is free, electricity and water are chargeable. You have to call a phone number and eventually someone will come by and turn on the tap and electricity.

title: (29660) Marbella - 3 Arrabal a Cañas
description: Parking with wide sidewalk behind, quiet residential area. At the foot of the highway, it is not a place to spend the night (because of the noise). Ideal to visit on foot the area of ​​Puerto Banús, about 20 minutes on foot.

title: (29678) Benahavís - 10 Urbanizacion el Cerrojo
description: drinking water source

title: (11312) Torreguadiaro - 7 Calle La Jara
description: Fuente de agua con grifo en una esquina de un parque infantil, hay que apretar constantemente para que salga el agua, algo molestoso, pero tiene mucha presión, está a 2 metros de la calle, sin mucha circulación

title: (29679) Benahavís - Carretera de Ronda
description: Lots of space, the street is demarcated by a wall, great view (if clear view) Quiet at night, hardly any cars

title: (29480) Gaucín - 4 Calle Jacobo Real
description: Parking day or night, very quiet, we parked for the night against the shed, practically flat floor, to know that Astra passes. Ideal to visit village and castle.

title: (11360) San Roque - 107 Las Camelias
description: Waterpipe in the park.

title: (29480) Gaucín - 22 Calle Jacobo Real
description: Parking on the side of the road at the entrance to the village. Room for 3 camping cars

title: (29480) Gaucín - 1 Carretera Ronda Jimena
description: Roadside parking, allows parking at the large Cc in the direction of the road, just at the end of the car park.

title: (29660) Marbella - 2 Calle Real
description: The most comfortable thing we found to visit Puerto Banús. 20 minutes walk from the port

title: (29678) Marbella -
description:
Bumpy and dusty road. But at the end you will find peace.

Dirt road along the river Guadaiza with plenty of places to camp along the river or at the end by the small lake. Calm and peaceful place, some MTB and dog walkers pass by.

Do a hike in the river with the fishes and turtles! Not allowed to swim in the lake, also no pets. But locals bring their dogs and let them swim.

title: (29660) Marbella - 68 Calle el Califa
description: Another comfortable parking for Banús. 20 minutes walk from the port

title: (29490) Benarrabá - A-369
description: Parking del ventorro las Corchas, you can park during the day, the entrance is a bit narrow but inside it is very good, the place is perfect to go on a hiking route and have lunch. The staff are lovely and you eat very well.

title: (29480) Gaucín - 168 Calle Luis de Armiñan
description: Free drinking water fountain. Also accessible with larger cars.

title: (11312) San Roque - 56 Las Camelias
description: This parking lot is for winter only. Parking is prohibited during summer and holidays. Parking at the beach and beautiful view. A dozen RVs are parked here during my visit. Places slightly sloping without service. Small supermarket 100m away. Please support the supermarket

title: (29480) Gaucín - 7 Carretera Algeciras
description: Petrol station with possibility to fill up with water and check tire pressure

title: (29490) Benarrabá -
description: Observatory and surveillance of the mountains. You can sleep and the very friendly guards offer you to use the service. Please, leave everything clean and cared for, it is a natural area. The access is very complicated, you have to go up a fairly steep ramp with potholes and gravel, but with great care, it is worth trying. Incredible views - we watched sunset, watch the moon rise and sunrise.

title: (11310) San Roque - Puerto Sotogrande
description: Laundry wash, drier, parking right next to it. If you continue down the breakwater road until the end there comes the harbor control tower and a gas station for boats. There is also a water hose to refill water for free. However, whenever the parking lots of the harbor fill up with visitors (weekends and dinner time weekdays) the gates are closed and they will not let you in with AC or security will immediately come and tell you to leave.

title: (29480) Gaucín - 1 Diseminado la Calera
description: Park overlooking Gaucin, in an extension of the park there is a fountain with drinking water, convenient to carry water.

title: (11310) San Roque - 26 Puerto Sotogrande
description: Parking at the entrance to the Sotogrande marina. No services.

title: (29660) Marbella - 4A Urbanizacion Nva Andalucia Aloha
description: Large vacant lot, flat, located between residences, not overlooked. No services. A large tree for shade. We spent 2 nights there in the middle of the season without a hitch. Garbage cans and restaurants nearby. Pleasant place for the night but far from the city center and the beaches.

title: (29679) Benahavís - Carretera de Ronda
description: Roadside water source, small parking lot in front

title: (29491) Algatocín - A-369
description: A belvedere in the middle of nature, superb view! Small quiet corner at All Saints' Day to spend the night. Parking lot with tables and bins.

title: (29480) Gaucín - 1 Ds Ventorro San Antonio
description: Spot a few kilometers from Gaucin (magnificent village), isolated from the road below and hidden from any dwelling. Beautiful view of the mountains and the valley, you can even see the sea and the Rock of Gibraltar in the distance. Wild goats around as neighbours. Flat land and easy to access. Only b mol, a high voltage line.

title: (29660) Marbella -
description: Small dirt parking lot for about 10 Camper or CamperVan type vehicles. 10 min walk from Banus and Portobanus beach.

title: (29660) Marbella - 60 Avenida de las Naciones Unidas
title_short: (29660) Marbella - 60 Avenida de las Naciones Unidas
description: Right on the beach and harbor of Marbella's upscale Puerto Banus. In the morning, it is easiest to find a parking space

title: (29660) Marbella - 18 Urbanizacion N Andalucia 8H
description: Lake of the Turtles, has picnic tables, playground and very quiet, perfect for day and night.

title: (29660) Marbella - 25 Calle los Granados
description: Parking in a quiet street. A dead end road so not much traffic. Very short walk to the beaches with toilets and cycle trail, and Puerto Banus.

title: () Benahavís - Carretera de Ronda
description: In the whole road you will find 3 or 4 picnic areas like this one, it does not have tables, but those of us who go by van have no problem, a shaded place (which is appreciated) and spectacular views.

title: (29660) Marbella - 28 Urbanizacion N Andalucia L
description: Lovely place with lake, playground and picnic area. Perfect to spend the day with the kids and rest

title: (29491) Algatocín - 1 Calle Ereta
description: Water point

title: (29660) Marbella - 4 Calle los Granados
description: public free parking lot. No prohibition signs. This morning there was a man in a yellow parkman's jacket, I spoke to him myself and he said I should give what I thought was right...;). There are public toilets and a restaurant on the beach across the bridge. In addition to my Caddy, a sprinter also stayed overnight.

title: (29440) Igualeja - Cam. de los Anadillos
description: Bulge with a great sea view on a side street that is rarely used. Ideal for one night. Road paved, but quite narrow. Also for larger van vehicles.

title: (29491) Algatocín -
description: Just a good spot to stop and enjoy. Flat area with views.

title: (29480) Gaucín - 4 Diseminado Zona el Ventorro
description: Nice corner to stay and nice viewpoint. Road is little busy, but a little windy that night.

title: (11310) San Roque - 1 Puerto Sotogrande
description:
Large day parking space.
Possibility to take a shower at the toilet of the café.

title: () Marbella -
description: Beautiful place overlooking the lake and a mountain, on the right you can see the sea. Made the way without a 4x4, but you're definitely on the safe side with one. Treat nature with respect!

title: (29660) Marbella - C. Lago Constanza
description: Magnificent view of the lake. Access for 4x4 on fairly flat ground. Space for 3 vehicles max.

title: (29602) Marbella - 109A Urbanización Villa Parra
description: Day parking lot wide enough to park along the street ideally located near Aldi we stayed there for lunch with a 6m80 motorhome without problem

title: (29602) Marbella - N 340
description: Free parking next to the Aldi, I come with a camperized boxer van and the truth is that I have no problems. Enjoy Marbella

title: (29602) Marbella - 107A Urbanización Villa Parra
description: Parking spaces in a quiet street. 20 minutes walk from the port.

title: (29602) Marbella -
description: It is the straight of a street like with stores and dealerships. A little further on there is an aldi. To visit Puerto Banus, about 25 minutes walk. During the day without problem, to spend the night too much circulation.

title: (11360) Pueblo Nuevo - 18 Calle Sierra Bermeja
description: We were looking for a washing machine here have 20 km 15 km and 10 km dryer 20 kg 15 kg on average the wash cycle is 30 minutes no matter if you go to 15:00 or within 20 km there is a vending machine and great service

title: (29491) Algatocín - Calle Cereria
description: Quiet place with children park and pinpon tables, has picnic area and water fountain

title: (29600) Marbella -
description: Beautiful places to spend the night !!! On the other hand, have a good 4X4 to access it

title: (29491) Benalauría - 50 MA-8306
description: Only possible place, if you are lucky, typical balcony parking on El Valle del Genal, refrain from “spacecraft” maximum 6.35m. Quiet town where to make some magnificent path (towards Benarraba, Genalguacil and some other town) we have slept and silence Even being at the main entrance is absolute.

title: (29450) Pujerra -
description: Nice spot next to a river and a calm road. Only 2 houses on the other side of the river. Spent one night. Room for multiple vans.

title: (29602) Marbella - Autopista del Mediterráneo
description: Rest area on westbound turnpike, relatively quiet, good place to crash once on the road.

title: () Júzcar - Camino de Pujerra
description: Very large parking in Júzcar.

title: (29493) Benadalid - A-369
description: Mirador de los Castañares. Viewpoint on the road from Juzgar to Gaucin. The ground is not uniform, slight slope. Very quiet to spend the night.

title: (29611) Istán - 59 Terreno Sau
description: Next to the road to Istan from estepona. During day busy, night was quiet. Beatiful view

title: (29462) Júzcar - MA-7303
description: Parking at the roadside at the entrance to juzcar. Little passage at night, good to spend a night there before leaving for hiking or canyoning.

title: (29462) Júzcar - Camino a Los Riscos
description: Free space a little above the little-traveled street. Perfect for one night, nice view.

title: (29462) Júzcar - Avenida Havaral
description: A few places nearby for the night. At 150 meters from the village, which is a beautiful village Smurf, worth the visit.

title: (29462) Júzcar - Av. Havaral
description: Siding by the side of the road, under a huge holm oak, with lots of shade. Garbage cans and an untreated water source next to it. We slept a very quiet night, cars passing from 9 in the morning

title: (29440) Benahavís - Carretera de Ronda
description: Nice point of view

title: (29602) Marbella - 1A Avenida Piedramar
description: A quiet and incredible area to park and stay for a couple of days! I stayed here for about 5 days, there are not many people, they come to walk with the dogs and then they leave. Clean and shady place! I have two dogs and it was amazing for us!

title: (29440) Igualeja - 12 Diseminado Poligono 2
description: Space for 2 large vans just off main road at the top of dirt track that leads down to a trail head. Level spot can be found. Fairly quiet with only local village traffic passing by occasionally.

title: (11350) Castellar de la Frontera -
description: Nice rural place near a eucalyptus grove and creek so ample shade for summer. Quick access off main highway on flat dirt roads.

title: (29602) Marbella - 175 Urbanización Marbella Sierra Blanca
description: Free outdoor parking, near Starlite Marbella, public and unguarded.

title: (29440) Igualeja - 70 Travesia Pio XII
description: Birth of the Genal river, we have only stopped, I do not know if you can spend the night, it has a picnic area only with benches and playground. Beautiful!

title: (29440) Igualeja - Unnamed Road
description: Free spot next to the road where you can park and see a beautiful deciduous forest. We visit it in the fall and it is spectacular. Impossible to spend the night for little space, but eating is fine.

title: (29460) Alpandeire - 2 Avenida de Andalucia
description: Free parking located behind a café / restaurant closed in low season. Overlooking the village of Alpandeira and the valley, the view is admirable. Accessible to all sizes, stabilized, no service but optimal satellite and 4G reception. Quiet, shaded parking, 300 meters from the center by a pedestrian-only lane. Near the viewpoint of Fray Léopoldo de Alpandeire and a church under construction, the place is recommended for its serenity.

title: (29460) Alpandeire -
description: Drinking water fountain

title: (29440) Igualeja -
description: Fairly flat site, near a water reserve and 200 m from a company. beautiful mountain view

title: (29460) Alpandeire - 40 Avenida de Andalucia
description: Below a busy road, at the foot of the Fray Léopoldo de Alpandeire viewpoint, this free car park is 300 meters from the village center. Shaded, stabilized and accessible to all sizes, it offers an exceptional panoramic view of the village and the valley. No services devolved to motorhomes except a water tap, satellite reception and optimal 4G.

title: (29460) Alpandeire - 44 Avenida de Andalucia
description: Esplanade at the entrance of the town. Parking area with easy access. We stayed overnight without incident.

title: (29602) Marbella - 179 Avenida Bulevar Príncipe Alfonso de Hohenlohe
title_short: (29602) Marbella - 179 Avenida Bulevar Príncipe Alfonso de Hohenlohe
description: Place for 3 campers

address.street: 179 Avenida Bulevar Príncipe Alfonso de Hohenlohe

title: (29611) Istán - Unnamed Road
description: Very quiet place

title: (29602) Marbella - 42 Avenida Bulevar Príncipe Alfonso de Hohenlohe
title_short: (29602) Marbella - 42 Avenida Bulevar Príncipe Alfonso de Hohenlohe
description: Parallel parking next to the superSol supermarket in Marbella. Idea for visiting the city. You have the supermarket next door to buy what you need. It is asphalted and with very little slope. On the one hand, there are trees that give you shade. It is very noisy, the avenue which passes next to it has a lot of traffic.  During the opening hours of the supermarket, you have access to public toilets. The beach is a 10 minute walk away. At 100 meters there is a bus stop to go to the center of Marbella or Puerto Banus.

address.street: 42 Avenida Bulevar Príncipe Alfonso de Hohenlohe

title: (29602) Marbella - 42 Avenida Bulevar Príncipe Alfonso de Hohenlohe
title_short: (29602) Marbella - 42 Avenida Bulevar Príncipe Alfonso de Hohenlohe
description: The car park is right behind Carrefour .. there were other campers parked. The supermarket closes at 22 so it is the ideal place to leave the camper and take a ride in the center .. there is the bus right in front (lidl side). I think you can stay overnight without any problems.

address.street: 42 Avenida Bulevar Príncipe Alfonso de Hohenlohe

title: (29452) Cartajima - Camino del Helechar
description: Large picnic area, level area, with capacity for 8 motorhomes, in the countryside, with rural trails, access is by passable lanes, is about 600 meters from the village of Cartajima, eye with height, the path is surrounded by trees, 3 , 5 m height approx

title: (11320) Jimena de la Frontera - San Pablo de Buceite
title_short: (11320) Jimena de la Frontera - San Pablo de Buceite
description: Small spot at the edge of the river. Clean, 20 m below a playground. Access by a path between bamboos, ok for vans but not for motorhomes. The road (bridge) is not very far but little noise.

title: (29462) Júzcar -
description: Esplanade where trails start. Very quiet, only goats and sheep are heard at night.

title: (29602) Marbella - 7 Calle Roy Boston
description: I LOVE this place! When traveling around alone as a young girl, being safe is very important. Even though this is just a parking spot by the street, I felt safe at all times! It’s right outside a hotel and there was other campers near by. I didn’t pay anything for parking (3 nights) and it’s a 5 min walk down to the beautiful beach. 15 min walk to central Marbella. I truly have nothing to complain about, it was perfect!

title: (29602) Marbella - 6 Urbanización la Virginia
description: Rough land parking area. Access okay for 8m van. Road leading to this area looks fairly tight, but it is fine

title: (29602) Marbella - C.C Avenida Bulevar Príncipe Alfonso de Hohenlohe
title_short: (29602) Marbella - C.C Avenida Bulevar Príncipe Alfonso de Hohenlohe
description: Free parking, it is attached to the road with a lawn separating it, the cars are heard at night but it compensates for the great shade that the big trees give in the morning, we were there for a whole day and a night without problem, gas station 24 hours at 300 meters that you can walk through any deviation.

address.street: C.C Avenida Bulevar Príncipe Alfonso de Hohenlohe

title: (29490) Cortes de la Frontera - Calle Buitreras
title_short: (29490) Cortes de la Frontera - Calle Buitreras
description: Parking for a very nice hike, do not follow the big pipe that goes up but go to the bottom then follow the river on your left. 1 hour walk very beautiful landscapes

title: (29602) Marbella - 3 N-340
description: Site behind him English court to park

title: (29611) Istán -
description: Open parking space, with trash bins. Departure point for hikes. Just next to the road.

title: (29602) Marbella - 416 Urbanización el Capricho
description: Free quiet parking for large campers behind the supermarket

title: (29602) Marbella - 10 Calle Estébanez Calderón
description: Potable water

title: (29602) Marbella - 4 Calle Diez de Oñate
description: Ideal parking if you come to participate in the CxM Sierra Blanca trail. Very quiet residential area and 10 minutes from downtown. There are supermarkets nearby.

title: (11360) San Roque - 102 Urbanización Torrecarbonera
description: Great place kilometers long, wide sandy beach with many parking options. Sand track only. Overlooking the Rock of Gebraltar.

title: (29452) Cartajima - 3 Avenida Fernando VII
description: Public drinking water tap

title: (29602) Marbella - 15 Calle Camilo José Cela
description: Free on street parking in the upmarket hotel area, appeared very safe and no restrictions that we encountered, this was over new year's and we stayed for three nights with no trouble, there were other vans there too.

title: (29490) Cortes de la Frontera - 14 Calle Buitreras
title_short: (29490) Cortes de la Frontera - 14 Calle Buitreras
description: On the side of the train track, at the beginning of the street that takes you to the route of the vultures or bathing in the river, shops and bars in the town square 5 minutes away.

title: (11320) Jimena de la Frontera - 6 A-405
description: Gasolinera Repsol, for refueling, free drainage of gray water, waste water and filling with clean water. There is also washing for Motorhome.

title: (29452) Cartajima - 3 Avenida Fernando VII
description: Superb small car park, separated from the "Restaurante El Mirador del Genal" by the road that leads to the village, stabilized, partially shaded and flat, it is accessible to all sizes.The view of the valley is exceptional.No service but satellite reception and 4G optimal Unfortunately no pictures and I have not spent the night at this place!
